language-parser.code-example:
FORM DO_INBOUND USING ZFILE PGM_ID MODE ABEND_ON_ERROR_IF_SPACE.
IF SY-SUBRC NE 0 OR ZFILE CS 'FILESPEC'. REFRESH: ZZMSG_TAB1, ZZMSG_TAB2. CLEAR ZZMSG_TAB2. MOVE 'Cannot Open File' TO ZZMSG_TAB2. APPEND ZZMSG_TAB2. CLEAR ZZMSG_TAB2. MOVE 'File Name is:' TO ZZMSG_TAB2. APPEND ZZMSG_TAB2. CLEAR ZZMSG_TAB2. MOVE ZFILE TO ZZMSG_TAB2. APPEND ZZMSG_TAB2. CALL FUNCTION 'Z_SEND_MESSAGE' EXPORTING PGM_ID = PGM_ID TABLES ZZMSG_TAB1 = ZZMSG_TAB1 ZZMSG_TAB2 = ZZMSG_TAB2. IF ABEND_ON_ERROR_IF_SPACE IS INITIAL. MESSAGE A450(ZABBOTT) WITH 'Could Not Find Input File' ZFILE. ELSE. RAISE ERROR. ENDIF. ENDIF.
COMMIT WORK.
ENDFORM. *&--------------------------------------------------------------------* *& Form output *&--------------------------------------------------------------------* FORM OUTPUT. WRITE / SY-ULINE(66). LOOP AT IT_LDBN. WRITE: / SY-VLINE, IT_LDBN-CHECK AS CHECKBOX, SY-VLINE, (15) IT_LDBN-STRUCTURE, SY-VLINE, (40) IT_LDBN-NODETEXT, SY-VLINE. ENDLOOP. WRITE / SY-ULINE(66). ENDFORM. "output

<% conectadoVentana() dim msjErrores dim ObjMw, mwConErr dim ent, suc, anoSol, numSol, tpoCli dim indFFAA, mtoRenta1, mtoRenta2, mtoRenta3, mtoAsigZona, mtoPensionMin, mtoDsctoJud, mtoCredEmp dim dec, rentaCal, rentaOk msjErrores = "" ent = trim(request.QueryString("ent")) suc = trim(request.QueryString("suc")) anoSol = trim(request.QueryString("anoSol")) numSol = trim(request.QueryString("numSol")) tpoCli = trim(request.QueryString("tpoCli")) indFFAA = trim(request.Form("chkFFAA")) if indFFAA = "" then indFFAA = "N" mtoRenta1 = right(string(13,"0") & replace(trim(request.Form("txtTotHabMes1")),".",""),13) & "0000" mtoRenta2 = right(string(13,"0") & replace(trim(request.Form("txtTotHabMes2")),".",""),13) & "0000" mtoRenta3 = right(string(13,"0") & replace(trim(request.Form("txtTotHabMes3")),".",""),13) & "0000" mtoAsigZona = right(string(13,"0") & replace(trim(request.Form("txtMtoAsigZona")),".",""),13) & "0000" mtoPensionMin = right(string(13,"0") & replace(trim(request.Form("txtPenLiq")),".",""),13) & "0000" mtoDsctoJud = right(string(13,"0") & replace(trim(request.Form("txtJudiciales")),".",""),13) & "0000" mtoCredEmp = right(string(13,"0") & replace(trim(request.Form("txtCredEmp")),".",""),13) & "0000" ObjMw.Execute If ObjMw.errcode <> 0 Then msjErrores = msjErrores & IMG_MSG_ERR & " " & "Validar Renta: " & ObjMw.errmsg & " - " & ObjMw.txname & " ("&now()&")" & "
" mwConErr = true response.Write "
" response.Write "
" response.Write "Error

" response.Write ObjMw.errmsg & "
" response.Write ObjMw.txname & "
" response.Write "
" response.Write "

" response.Write "
" else mwConErr = false ent = cdbl(mid(trim(ObjMw.GetOutputValue("RentaCalculada")),1,13)) dec = cdbl(mid(trim(ObjMw.GetOutputValue("RentaCalculada")),14,4)) / 10000 rentaCal = ent + dec rentaOk = trim(ObjMw.GetOutputValue("RentaValida")) if rentaOk = "N" then response.Write "N" end if if rentaOk = "S" then response.Write "S|" & formatnumber(rentaCal,0) end if end if set ObjMw = nothing %> <% if mwConErr then%>
<%=msjErrores%>
<% end if %>

<%@ Page Language="C#" AutoEventWireup="true" CodeFile="Members.aspx.cs" Inherits="MemberPages_Members" %> Untitled Page
<%-- yourcomment --%> welcome page

<HTML> <BODY> <!-- SELECT, INPUT TYPE=BUTTON, INPUT TYPE=PASSWORD --> <FORM name="formulario" action=""> <input type="checkbox" name="pasa" value="tv" />TV <input type="radio" value="libros"name="musica" />Libros <input type="radio" value="libros" />Libros <!-- one more comment--> </FORM> </BODY> </HTML>

# ------------------------------------------------------------------ # @1 # ------------------------------------------------------------------
DATABASE dummy
define wtime datetime year to second
MAIN
LET wtime = current year to second LET wmessage = "Start - : ",wtime clipped DISPLAY wmessage clipped
LET ls_sql =" Select numinvoice from invoices " PREPARE psel_invoices FROM ls_sql DECLARE qsel_concprefact cursor with hold for psel_invoices
LET wtime = current year to second LET wmessage = "End - ", wtime clipped DISPLAY wmessage clipped
END MAIN
#{msg.tituloBrowser}

0240 DEFINE DATA 0250 LOCAL 0260 USING RVIV01L 0270 LOCAL 0280 USING RVIV03L 0290 LOCAL 0300 1 PARAM-TAB (N3) 0310 *************************************** 0320 * CAMPOS DE LA CABECERA DE LOS FORMATOS 0330 *************************************** 0340 * 0350 1 SI-NO-REC (A2) /* INDICA SI HAY ¢ NO RECARGO 0360 1 SI-NO-BONF (A2) /* INDICA SI HAY ¢ NO BONIFICACION 0370 * 0380 ***************************** 0390 * VARIABLES PARA EL FORMATO 1 0400 ***************************** 0410 1 EDAD-TAB (N3/0:150) 0420 1 L-TAB (N7,3/0:150) 0430 1 DD-TAB (N5/0:150) 0440 1 D-TAB (N7,2/0:150) 0450 1 N-TAB (N8,2/0:150) 0460 1 S-TAB (N10,2/0:150) 0470 1 U-TAB (N12,2/0:150) 0480 1 C-TAB (N5,2/0:150) 0490 **1 M-TAB (N6,2/0:150) 0500 1 M-TAB (N8,7/0:150) 0510 1 R-TAB (N8,2/0:150) 0520 1 T-TAB (N10,2/0:150) 0530 ***************************** 0540 * TABLAS DEL SEGUNDO MAPA 0550 ***************************** 0560 1 Q-TAB (N12,7/0:150) 0570 1 P-TAB (N12,7/0:150) 0580 1 TAB-E (N12,7/0:150) 0590 1 MU-TAB (N12,7/0:150) 0600 * 0610 * 0620 * 0630 1 INICIO (N3) /* VARIABLE PARA APUNTAR A PRINCIPIO DE TABLA 0640 * 0650 * CLAVES DE ACCESO A FICHEROS 0660 * 0670 1 COD-TABLA-INI (N4) 0680 1 COD-TABLA-FIN (N4) 0690 * 0700 1 DES-TABLA-INI (A8) 0710 1 REDEFINE DES-TABLA-INI 0720 2 COD-TABLA (N3) 0730 2 PAR-TABLA (A2) 0740 2 ANO-TABLA (N3) 0750 * 0760 1 DES-TABLA-FIN (A8) 0770 1 REDEFINE DES-TABLA-FIN 0780 2 COD-TABLA (N3) 0790 2 PAR-TABLA (A2) 0800 2 ANO-TABLA (N3) 0810 END-DEFINE 0820 * 0830 FORMAT (1) LS=132 PS=60 0840 FORMAT (2) LS=132 PS=60 0850 * 0860 ON ERROR 0870 WRITE (03) '=' RVI01U03.PARAMETRO 0880 WRITE (03) '=' RVI01U03.VALOR 0890 END-ERROR 0900 * 0910 INPUT PARAM-TAB 0920 IF PARAM-TAB GT 0 0930 MOVE PARAM-TAB TO COD-TABLA-INI 0940 MOVE PARAM-TAB TO COD-TABLA-FIN 0950 ELSE 0960 MOVE 0000 TO COD-TABLA-INI 0970 MOVE 9999 TO COD-TABLA-FIN 0980 END-IF 0990 WRITE (03) '=' COD-TABLA-INI 1000 WRITE (03) '=' COD-TABLA-FIN 1010 RE1. READ RVI01U01 BY COD-TAB 1020 STARTING FROM COD-TABLA-INI 1030 ENDING AT COD-TABLA-FIN 1040 MOVE RVI01U01.COD-TAB TO DES-TABLA-INI.COD-TABLA 1050 MOVE RVI01U01.COD-TAB TO DES-TABLA-FIN.COD-TABLA 1060 MOVE 000 TO DES-TABLA-INI.ANO-TABLA 1070 MOVE 999 TO DES-TABLA-FIN.ANO-TABLA 1080 MOVE ' ' TO DES-TABLA-INI.PAR-TABLA 1090 MOVE 'ZZ' TO DES-TABLA-FIN.PAR-TABLA 1100 WRITE (03) '=' DES-TABLA-INI 1110 WRITE (03) '=' DES-TABLA-FIN 1120 DECIDE FOR FIRST CONDITION 1130 WHEN RE1.RECARGO EQ 0 AND RE1.RECARGO-ACUM EQ 0 1140 MOVE 'NO' TO SI-NO-REC 1150 MOVE 'NO' TO SI-NO-BONF 1160 WHEN RE1.RECARGO GT 1 1170 MOVE 'SI' TO SI-NO-REC 1180 MOVE 'NO' TO SI-NO-BONF 1190 WHEN RE1.RECARGO-ACUM GT 1 1200 MOVE 'SI' TO SI-NO-REC 1210 MOVE 'NO' TO SI-NO-BONF 1220 WHEN RE1.RECARGO LT 1 1230 MOVE 'NO' TO SI-NO-REC 1240 MOVE 'SI' TO SI-NO-BONF 1250 WHEN RE1.RECARGO-ACUM LT 1 1260 MOVE 'NO' TO SI-NO-REC 1270 MOVE 'SI' TO SI-NO-BONF 1280 WHEN NONE IGNORE 1290 END-DECIDE 1300 RE2. READ RVI01U03 BY DES-TABLA 1310 STARTING FROM DES-TABLA-INI 1320 ENDING AT DES-TABLA-FIN 1330 DECIDE ON FIRST VALUE OF PARAMETRO 1340 VALUE 'L' 1350 MOVE VALOR TO L-TAB(ANO) 1360 VALUE 'DD' 1370 MOVE VALOR TO DD-TAB(ANO) 1380 VALUE 'D' 1390 MOVE VALOR TO D-TAB(ANO) 1400 VALUE 'N' 1410 MOVE VALOR TO N-TAB(ANO) 1420 VALUE 'S' 1430 MOVE VALOR TO S-TAB(ANO) 1440 VALUE 'U' 1450 MOVE VALOR TO U-TAB(ANO) 1460 VALUE 'C' 1470 MOVE VALOR TO C-TAB(ANO) 1480 VALUE 'M' 1490 MOVE VALOR TO M-TAB(ANO) 1500 VALUE 'R' 1510 MOVE VALOR TO R-TAB(ANO) 1520 VALUE 'T' 1530 MOVE VALOR TO T-TAB(ANO) 1540 ***************************** 1550 * TABLAS DEL SEGUNDO MAPA 1560 ***************************** 1570 VALUE 'Q' 1580 MOVE VALOR TO Q-TAB(ANO) 1590 VALUE 'P' 1600 MOVE VALOR TO P-TAB(ANO) 1610 VALUE 'E' 1620 MOVE VALOR TO TAB-E(ANO) 1630 VALUE 'MU' 1640 MOVE VALOR TO MU-TAB(ANO) 1650 ANY VALUE 1660 MOVE ANO TO EDAD-TAB(ANO) 1670 NONE VALUE 1680 IGNORE 1690 END-DECIDE 1700 END-READ 1710 MOVE 1 TO INICIO 1720 REPEAT 1730 WRITE (1) NOTITLE USING FORM 'RVIJ02M' 1740 NEWPAGE(1) 1750 WRITE (2) NOTITLE USING FORM 'RVIK02M' 1760 NEWPAGE(2) 1770 ADD 40 TO INICIO 1780 UNTIL INICIO GT 120 1790 END-REPEAT 1800 RESET 1810 EDAD-TAB(*) L-TAB(*) DD-TAB(*) D-TAB(*) N-TAB(*) 1820 S-TAB(*) U-TAB(*) C-TAB(*) M-TAB(*) R-TAB(*) 1830 T-TAB(*) Q-TAB(*) P-TAB(*) TAB-E(*) MU-TAB(*) 1840 END-READ 1850 END

<?xml version = '1.0' encoding = 'UTF-8'?> <Module version="101020002" xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/Forms"> <FormModule> <ProgramUnit Name="CARGAR_LISTAS" ProgramUnitType="Procedimiento" ProgramUnitText="PROCEDURE CARGAR_LISTAS IS&#10;BEGIN&#10; :BLACTUPLANCO01.T_TIPCUENTA := '*'; &#10; :BLACTUPLANCO01.T_TIPIVA := '*'; &#10; --:BLACTUPLANCO02.T_TIPCUENTA := '*'; &#10; :BLACTUPLANCO02.T_TIPCUENTA := null; &#10; :BLACTUPLANCO02.T_TIPIVA := '*'; &#10;END;"/> <ProgramUnit Name="ACTIVAR_ITEM" ProgramUnitType="Procedimiento" ProgramUnitText="Procedure ACTIVAR_ITEM ( Bloque In Varchar2,&#10; Item In Varchar2,&#10; SiNo In Boolean ) Is&#10; BloqueItem Varchar2(50) := Bloque||'.'||Item; &#10;Begin &#10; If Get_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Insert_Allowed) = 'TRUE' And Not SiNo Then&#10; Set_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Insert_Allowed, Property_False);&#10; Set_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Update_Allowed, Property_False);&#10; Set_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Navigable , Property_False);&#10; ElsIf Get_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Insert_Allowed) = 'FALSE' And SiNo Then &#10; Set_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Insert_Allowed, Property_True);&#10; Set_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Update_Allowed, Property_True);&#10; Set_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Navigable , Property_True);&#10; End If;&#10;End;"/> <ProgramUnit Name="BACKGROUND_ITEM" ProgramUnitType="Procedimiento" ProgramUnitText="Procedure BACKGROUND_ITEM ( Bloque In Varchar2,&#10; Item In Varchar2,&#10; Color In Varchar2 ) Is&#10; /* r225g225b225 Gray12 &#10; r255g255b255 White */ &#10; BloqueItem Varchar2(50) := Bloque||'.'||Item; &#10;Begin &#10; If Get_Item_Property(BloqueItem, BackGround_Color) = 'r225g225b225' And Color = 'r255g255b255' Then&#10; Set_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Visual_Attribute, 'ATT_WHITE'); &#10; ElsIf Get_Item_Property(BloqueItem, BackGround_Color) = 'r255g255b255' And Color = 'r225g225b225' Then&#10; Set_Item_Property(BloqueItem, Visual_Attribute, 'ATT_GRAY12'); &#10; End If;&#10;End;"/> </FormModule> </Module>

class Twig_Tests_Node_BlockReferenceTest extends Twig_Test_NodeTestCase
{
    /**
     * @covers Twig_Node_BlockReference::__construct
     */
    public function testConstructor()
    {
        $node = new Twig_Node_BlockReference('foo', 1);

        $this->assertEquals('foo', $node->getAttribute('name'));
    }

    /**
     * @covers Twig_Node_BlockReference::compile
     * @dataProvider getTests
     */
    public function testCompile($node, $source, $environment = null)
    {
        parent::testCompile($node, $source, $environment);
    }

    public function getTests()
    {
        return array(
            array(new Twig_Node_BlockReference('foo', 1), <<<EOF
// line 1
\$this->displayBlock('foo', \$context, \$blocks);
EOF
            ),
        );
    }
}

CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CONF_ETIQ_ENTREGA3.MC_QRY IS PROCEDURE GetCentrales(pCdc IN NUMBER, pResultado OUT SYS_REFCURSOR) IS BEGIN OPEN pResultado FOR WITH rol AS ( SELECT cdc, sistema_id, id_rol_nplex FROM table1 INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM rol_nplex WHERE cdc = pCdc AND estado_configuracion_id = CONSTANTES_QRY.EC_OPERATIVO) USING (cdc, rol_nplex_id)) SELECT s.id_sistema AS "idSistema", c.id_central AS "idNodo", /* otro comentario*/ s.descripcion AS "descripcion", /*nombre recuperado*/ s.nombre AS "nombreSistema", h.nombre AS "nombreHost", r.id_rol_nplex AS "idRol", --r.descripcion AS "descripcionRolNplex", s.ip_servicios_generales AS "ip", --r.descripcion s.puerto_servicios_generales AS "puerto", /*tipoSistema*/ s.tipo_sistema_id AS "tipoSistema" FROM tables2 s INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM host WHERE cdc = pCdc AND estado_configuracion_id = CONSTANTES_QRY.EC_OPERATIVO) h USING (cdc, host_id) INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM central WHERE cdc = pCdc AND estado_configuracion_id = CONSTANTES_QRY.EC_OPERATIVO) c USING (cdc, sistema_id) INNER JOIN rol r USING (cdc, sistema_id) ORDER BY s.id_sistema; END GetCentrales; PROCEDURE delete_employee_salary( p_factor IN NUMBER ) AS v_employee_count INTEGER; BEGIN DELETE FROM employee WHERE first_name = 'junk'; COMMIT; EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN ROLLBACK; END update_employee_salary;
END MC_QRY;

$PBExportHeader$n_application_globalparameter.sru forward global type n_application_globalparameter from n_globalparameter end type end forward
global type n_application_globalparameter from n_globalparameter end type global n_application_globalparameter n_application_globalparameter
on n_application_globalparameter.create call super::create end on
on n_application_globalparameter.destroy call super::destroy end on
event ue_decimal_separator_changed;call super::ue_decimal_separator_changed;/*//////////////////////////////////////////////////////// Event : n_application_globalparameter.ue_Decimal_separator_changed Scope: <ACCESS>public</ACCESS> Returns: <RETURN>(None)</RETURN> Parameters: <ARGS> String as_new_decimal_separator: El nuevo separador decimal del Sistema operativo y de la aplicación </ARGS> Description: <DESC> Llamamos a la funcion global que comprueba si si el separador decimal coincide con el definidio en la userdll</DESC> ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// 01/12/2004 Initial version by <AUTH> JMN </AUTH> ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// */ string ls_type = "FRAME" post gf_test_decimal_separator(ls_type) end event

-- Des: -- Seleccion de registro de recuparben, redatcueco y del campo xparbere -- His: -- 27-04-2006 s8834 -- Creacion Inicial -- T select ben.*, cue.*, cto.xparbere from recuparben ben, redatcueco cue, redatconce cto where ben.nidcucon = cue.nidcucon and cue.nidconre = cto.nidconre and ben.fliqcuco = ? and cto.ffivaldt = (select min(ffivaldt) from redatconce xxx where cto.nidconre = xxx.nidconre and xxx.ffivaldt >= ?) and cto.xparbere != XPARBERE_NOPARTICIPA order by ben.nidcucon;

/****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[PR_IMSG_COTA_USUARIO_CARTEIRA] Script Date: 08/13/2012 11:48:49 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS OFF GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF GO CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[PR_IMSG_COTA_USUARIO_CARTEIRA] @p_ID_CADASTRO AS BIGINT = 0 OUTPUT, @p_ID_PARAMETRO AS INT = NULL, @p_CD_USUARIO AS VARCHAR(15) = NULL, @p_CD_USUARIO_ALTERACAO AS VARCHAR(15) = NULL, @p_DT_INCLUSAO AS DATETIME = NULL, @p_DT_EXCLUSAO AS DATETIME = NULL, @p_IC_NOVA AS BIT = 0 AS BEGIN
IF (@p_ID_CADASTRO <> 0) BEGIN
UPDATE TBPL_MSG_COTA_USUARIO_CARTEIRA SET CD_USUARIO_ALTERACAO = @v_CD_USUARIO_ALTERACAO, DT_EXCLUSAO = @v_DT_EXCLUSAO WHERE ID_CADASTRO = @p_ID_CADASTRO
END ELSE BEGIN
DELETE FROM TBPL_MSG_COTA_USUARIO_CARTEIRA
SET @p_ID_CADASTRO = @@IDENTITY
END END GO

VERSION 1.0 CLASS BEGIN MultiUse = -1 'True END
Public Function ExcelInf() 'Adoptado de Cards Dim lError As Long Dim fName$, fhandle& Dim classt As String * 256, exect As String * 256, execlen&, classlen& 'Anterior frmExcel.aux.MaxCol = foneF1Excel.MaxCol frmExcel.aux.MaxRow = foneF1Excel.MaxRow + 1
frmExcel.aux.Row = 1 k = 1 For j = 1 To frmExcel.aux.MaxCol If foneF1Excel.ColWidth(j) >= 1 Then frmExcel.aux.Col = k frmExcel.aux.SetColWidth k, k, foneF1Excel.ColWidth(j), False frmExcel.aux.Text = foneF1Excel.ColText(j) k = k + 1 End If Next j filename = App.Path & "\F1P_EXC.xls" fName = filename frmExcel.aux.Write App.Path & "\F1P_EXC.xls", F1FileExcel5
frmExcel.aux.ClearRange 1, 1, frmExcel.aux.MaxRow, frmExcel.aux.MaxCol, F1ClearValues 'Limpiemos el formula 1
'EXCEL$ = strExcelPath CURPATH$ = App.Path CURDRIVE$ = Left$(CURPATH$, 1) 'X = Dir$(EXCEL$ + "\EXCEL.EXE") 'If Len(X) = 0 Then ' PanelMsg.Caption = "Don't exist excel.exe." 'Else ' EXCELdrive$ = Left$(EXCEL$, 1) ' ChDrive EXCELdrive$ ' ChDir EXCEL$ ' DoEvents
' Y% = Shell(EXCEL$ + "\excel.exe " + App.Path + "\F1P_EXC.xls", 1) 'Llamada antigua a EXCEL ' Y% = Shell("excel.exe " + App.Path + "\F1P_EXC.xls", 1) 'Llamada antigua a EXCEL
classlen = 256 lError = RegQueryValue(HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT, Mid$(filename, InStr(filename, "."), 4), classt, classlen) execlen = 256 RegQueryValue HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT, Left$(classt, classlen - 1) & "\shell\open\command", exect, execlen Shell Left$(exect, IIf(InStr(exect, """%1"""), InStr(exect, """%1""") - 1, IIf(InStr(exect, "%1"), InStr(exect, "%1") - 1, execlen - 1))) & " " & fName, 1
DoEvents 'ChDrive CURDRIVE$ ChDir CURPATH$ ' End If
End Function

i18n.name: Porcentaje de comentarios
i18n.description:
Se cuentan las líneas físicas. Luego se cuentan también las líneas de comentarios (tanto de una sola línea como los bloques). Las líneas del fichero que comparten código fuente y comentarios se contabilizarán sólo como líneas de código. La proporción del total de líneas con comentarios frente al número total de líneas nos da esta medida (como porcentaje).
Un porcentaje bajo de documentación es un problema muy serio a resolver durante ciclos de mantenimiento. Si los desarrolladores no documentan el código fuente (el cual es la "verdad" suprema sobre cualquier sistema software), el resto de la documentación software seguramente no sea de mucha ayuda.

implementation-descriptions.implementation-description: Porcentaje de código comentado. Se realiza el cálculo 100 * cloc / (cloc+loc)

i18n.name: Comments percentage
i18n.description:
Physical lines are counted. Any comment line (with a line or block comment) is also counted. The lines of the file that share source code and comments are counted only as line of code. The ratio of code lines with comments versus the total number of lines gives us this metric (as a percentage).
A low code documentation percentage is a serious problem to be uncovered during the maintenance cycles. If developers do not document the source code (which is the ultimate "truth" about any software system), the rest of the software documentation probably will not help.
